short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Internet's AI Assistant. Answers tough questions. Summarizes articles. Searches smartly. Use it anywhere. Totally free.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🆕👉 "PDF" Feature
Now you can use Gene on any PDF! Just follow these steps - highlight, right click, and ask Gene. Or type "/webpage" to reference the whole PDF. It's that easy!


🚀 Gene is your all-in-one AI assistant powered by GPT-4.
Hit Ctrl + Q, and you’re ready to go!
Gene helps you search, read, write, translate, and much more—all in one place.

Key Features:
💬 AI Chat
✨ Chat with the latest ChatGPT model seamlessly across any webpage.

Chat & Summarize
📚 Webpage Summaries: Type "/webpage" to reference page and get concise summaries of long articles without having to read everything.
🖍️ Highlight & Learn: Select any text on a webpage, and Gene will answer your questions right away.
📄 PDF Search:  Freely open any PDF—whether online or from your computer—use "/webpage" to reference the whole doc, or highlight any text, right-click, and ask Gene!

Smart Search
🧠 Search Agent: Ask a question, and Gene will intelligently search the web, review the results, and deliver an accurate answer using multiple keywords.

Write with AI
📝 Write Agent: Share a topic, and Gene will create structured outlines with detailed content and references.
✏️ Content Assistant: Provide a prompt, and we’ll turn it into polished, well-written content for you.

Instant Translation
🌍 Text Translation: Quickly translate selected text on any webpage—no copy-pasting needed.

Problem Solve
➕ Math & Code Solutions: Get step-by-step explanations for math problems and solve coding challenges instantly.


💻 How to Use:
🔹 Add Gene to Chrome and pin it to your toolbar.
🔹 Press Ctrl+Q to wake up Gene.
🔹 Start leveraging the power of AI instantly!


❓ Frequently Asked Questions:

🗣️ Do I need a ChatGPT/OpenAI account?
Nope! You don’t need an OpenAI account to use Gene.

💸 Is Gene free to use?
Yes, it's absolutely free.

📧 Need Help?
Got questions or suggestions? Reach out to us at 💌 contact@askgene.io.

Get ready to supercharge your productivity with Gene! ⚡
